barista_admin_record.sql_select: SELECT sfe_womastr.firm_id, sfe_womastr.wo_location, sfe_womastr.wo_no, sfe_womastr.wo_status, sfe_womastr.wo_type, sfc_wotypecd.code_desc, sfe_womastr.wo_category, sfe_womastr.customer_id, arm_custmast.customer_name, sfe_womastr.order_no, sfe_womastr.unit_measure, sfe_womastr.warehouse_id, ivc_whsecode.short_name, sfe_womastr.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, sfe_womastr.opened_date, sfe_womastr.eststt_date, sfe_womastr.estcmp_date, sfe_womastr.act_st_date, sfe_womastr.lstact_date, sfe_womastr.closed_date, sfe_womastr.description_01,sfe_womastr.description_02, sfe_womastr.drawing_no, sfe_womastr.drawing_rev, sfe_womastr.priority, sfe_womastr.sched_flag, sfe_womastr.sch_prod_qty, sfe_womastr.qty_cls_todt, sfe_womastr.cls_cst_todt, sfe_womastr.est_yield[$0a$]FROM sfe_womastr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN sfc_wotypecd ON sfc_wotypecd.firm_id=sfe_womastr.firm_id AND sfc_wotypecd.record_id_a='A' AND sfc_wotypecd.wo_type=sfe_womastr.wo_type[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arm_custmast ON arm_custmast.firm_id=sfe_womastr.firm_id AND arm_custmast.customer_id=sfe_womastr.customer_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivc_whsecode ON ivc_whsecode.firm_id=sfe_womastr.firm_id AND ivc_whsecode.record_id_c='C' AND ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id=sfe_womastr.warehouse_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemmast ON ivm_itemmast.firm_id=sfe_womastr.firm_id AND ivm_itemmast.item_id=sfe_womastr.item_id[$0a$]
